title: Thai Zoo That Homes Viral Pygmy Hippo 'Moo Deng' Earns 4 Times More Now
content: An endangered baby pygmy hippo that shot to social media stardom in Thailand has become a lucrative source of income for her home zoo, quadrupling its ticket sales, the institution said Thursday.
summary: An endangered baby pygmy hippo that shot to social media stardom in Thailand has become a lucrative source of income for her home zoo, quadrupling its ticket sales, the institution said Thursday.

title: Finland Zoo To Return 2 Pandas To China Because They Are Too Expensive
content: Since 1949, China has strategically loaned giant pandas to foreign zoos to foster trade ties, strengthen diplomatic relations, and enhance its global image.
summary: Since 1949, China has strategically loaned giant pandas to foreign zoos to foster trade ties, strengthen diplomatic relations, and enhance its global image.

title: Alabama Set To Carry Out Second Execution Using Nitrogen Gas
content: Alabama is set to carry out the second execution in the United States using nitrogen hypoxia, a controversial method critics say is tantamount to torture.
summary: Alabama is set to carry out the second execution in the United States using nitrogen hypoxia, a controversial method critics say is tantamount to torture.

title: "Eating The Cats": Parody Song On Trump's Remark Gets 8.7 Million Views
content: A pet-loving part-time musician is fast becoming a global star by gently poking fun at Donald Trump for suggesting that Haitian immigrants are making a meal of America's cats and dogs.
summary: A pet-loving part-time musician is fast becoming a global star by gently poking fun at Donald Trump for suggesting that Haitian immigrants are making a meal of America's cats and dogs.

title: Elon Musk, Not Invited To Investment Summit, Lashes Out At UK
content: Elon Musk hit back at Britain on Thursday after reports that he had not been invited to the country's upcoming investment summit, alleging the government was releasing convicted paedophiles while imprisoning people over social media posts.
summary: Elon Musk hit back at Britain on Thursday after reports that he had not been invited to the country's upcoming investment summit, alleging the government was releasing convicted paedophiles while imprisoning people over social media posts.

title: India Elected To Global Anti-Corruption Platform's Steering Panel In China
content: India was elected to the 15-member steering committee of the global anti-corruption platform GlobE Network after multi-stage voting in Beijing on Thursday, officials said.
summary: India was elected to the 15-member steering committee of the global anti-corruption platform GlobE Network after multi-stage voting in Beijing on Thursday, officials said.

title: China Boarding School Punishes Student For Using Toilet Late At Night
content: An anonymous teacher said that the school had strict rules prohibiting students from walking around the dormitory after 10:45 pm, and surprisingly, even using the toilet was not allowed after this time.
summary: An anonymous teacher said that the school had strict rules prohibiting students from walking around the dormitory after 10:45 pm, and surprisingly, even using the toilet was not allowed after this time.

title: Indian Embassy In Beijing Asks Indian Nationals To Register With Mission
content: The Indian Embassy in Beijing on Thursday advised all Indian nationals residing in China to register with the mission, which will be a requirement for all future services to be availed from the Embassy.
summary: The Indian Embassy in Beijing on Thursday advised all Indian nationals residing in China to register with the mission, which will be a requirement for all future services to be availed from the Embassy.

title: "Hezbollah Doesn't Want You To Watch This Video": Israel Defence Forces
content: The Israel Defence Forces (IDF) has released a video explaining its strikes deep inside Lebanon where it alleged Hezbollah had hidden weapons in populated areas.
summary: The Israel Defence Forces (IDF) has released a video explaining its strikes deep inside Lebanon where it alleged Hezbollah had hidden weapons in populated areas.

title: French President Backs India For Permanent UN Security Council Membership
content: French President Emmanuel Macron has voiced strong support for India's inclusion as a permanent member of a reformed United Nations Security Council (UNSC), along with Germany, Japan, Brazil, and two African nations.
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron has voiced strong support for India's inclusion as a permanent member of a reformed United Nations Security Council (UNSC), along with Germany, Japan, Brazil, and two African nations.

title: In A First In UK, 34-Year-Old Woman Dies After Brazilian Butt Lift Procedure
content: Ms Webb's death sparked a police investigation, with Gloucestershire Police arresting two individuals on suspicion of manslaughter.
summary: Ms Webb's death sparked a police investigation, with Gloucestershire Police arresting two individuals on suspicion of manslaughter.

title: How Nations Are Evacuating Their Citizens From War-Torn Lebanon
content: A sharp escalation in border warfare between Israel and Hezbollah in Lebanon has sent Western nations scrambling to update contingency plans for evacuations from the region.
summary: A sharp escalation in border warfare between Israel and Hezbollah in Lebanon has sent Western nations scrambling to update contingency plans for evacuations from the region.

title: Pakistan Braces For "Transitional Pain" As IMF Approves $7 Billion Loan
content: Pakistan said Thursday it would have to go through "transitional pain" after the International Monetary Fund agreed to a new relief package of $7 billion to bolster its faltering economy.
summary: Pakistan said Thursday it would have to go through "transitional pain" after the International Monetary Fund agreed to a new relief package of $7 billion to bolster its faltering economy.

title: Secret Service Agent Accused Of Sexually Assaulting Harris Campaign Worker
content: A US Secret Service agent has been accused of sexually assaulting a staffer for Kamala Harris in a hotel room, The Independent reported.
summary: A US Secret Service agent has been accused of sexually assaulting a staffer for Kamala Harris in a hotel room, The Independent reported.

title: "Reckless, Irresponsible": EU Rejects Putin's Nuclear Weapon Threat
content: The European Union on Thursday rejected as "reckless and irresponsible" a plan by President Vladimir Putin to authorise a nuclear response to a massive air attack on Russia.
summary: The European Union on Thursday rejected as "reckless and irresponsible" a plan by President Vladimir Putin to authorise a nuclear response to a massive air attack on Russia.

title: Earth-Like Planet Found Orbiting Distant Star, But There's A Major Catch
content: The search for a second Earth within the Milky Way is ongoing, but a recently discovered planet falls short of the mark.
summary: The search for a second Earth within the Milky Way is ongoing, but a recently discovered planet falls short of the mark.

title: Netanyahu Ignores Truce Call, Orders Army To Fight Hezbollah With Full Force
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Thursday his government had not responded to a push by the United States and its allies for a 21-day ceasefire in Israel's fight with Lebanese armed group Hezbollah.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Thursday his government had not responded to a push by the United States and its allies for a 21-day ceasefire in Israel's fight with Lebanese armed group Hezbollah.

title: Is Sarco Pod Illegal Even In Switzerland, Which Allows Assisted Suicide?
content: The Sarco Pod, a futuristic capsule designed for assisted suicide, has sparked a massive controversy in Switzerland, especially after a 64-year-old American woman used one recently.

title: US, Allies Call For 21-day Ceasefire On Israel-Lebanon Border
content: The United States and its allies have called for a 21-day ceasefire on the Israel-Lebanon border, effective immediately.

title: Sarco Suicide Pod: How The Controversial Capsule Functions
content: A 64-year-old woman from the US recently died by suicide using the Sarco suicide pod at a woodland retreat in Switzerland.
